---
title: Blast
---

## Overview

Blast is an Ethereum L2 introducing the concept of "native yield", which is derived from staking economics on mainnet (and Tbills). It was founded by Tieshun (@pacmanblur), founder of Blur. They have S tier go-to-market strategy.

## Ecosystem

They are leading their ecosystem push with the [Big Bang Competition](https://blast.io/en/bigbang).
